text: No current events at this time.
exhibition/text:
Center "Kupalinka" invites creative people to take an active part in the "Christmas-New Year Exhibition-Fair" of hand made souveniers.
The application form for participation must be submitted in advance by phone: 303-386-4508, 720-412-4116.
"Christmas-New Year Exhibition-Fair" is open to all comers to buy and to look at interesting souveniers.
tour/text:
We organize an excursion "Christmas lights of the city".
You can call and order the tickets in advance by phone: 720-412-4116, 303-386-4508
russianChristmas/text:
We are celebrating The Old New Year.
An amusing, musical and entertaining program awaits: karaoke, New Year sketches, attractive and fabulous New Year's hall.
Cocktail Reception included.
Order the tickets by phone: 720-412-4116, 303-386-4508.
